definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
not having any special skill/without any qualifications
lit. for some things a foot may be too short, and for the other an inch will suffice (proverb)/fig. everyone has their strong and weak points/everything has its advantages and disadvantages
pinyin: chi3 you3 suo3 duan3 , cun4 you3 suo3 chang2

sentences.english: Music or sound effects to bring out the best of your creations.
sentences.chinese: 音乐或声音效果，以发挥所长，你的创作。

sentences.english: The current director is Professor Wang Keqiang.
sentences.chinese: 研究所所长为王克强教授。

sentences.english: New era brings forward new requirements for local police directors.
sentences.chinese: 新时期对公安派出所所长提出新的要求。

sentences.english: He was nominated as vice - director of the institute.
sentences.chinese: 他被任命为研究所副所长。

sentences.english: You are welcome! Is there any position which could develop my best ability?
sentences.chinese: 不客气，您那边有可以让我发挥所长的岗位吗？

sentences.english: We bring out the best in each other and create strong and successful working relationships.
sentences.chinese: 让每个人发挥所长，建立密切和谐的工作关系。

sentences.english: As for the internal versus external language decision, each has its advantages.
sentences.chinese: 内部和外部领域特定语言其实各有所长。

sentences.english: Ding Xielin was the first director of the institute.
sentences.chinese: 丁燮林是该所的第一任所长。

sentences.english: The bureau chief thinks to matter to importance and immediately turn up.
sentences.chinese: 所长认为事关重要，立即转上。

sentences.english: And with my experience, I feel that I could make a real impact .
sentences.chinese: 而且以我的经验，我觉得我能真正发挥所长。

sentences.english: China is making a late entry into chip making, admits Zhiwei Xu, deputy director of ICT.
sentences.chinese: ICT副所长徐志伟承认中国是芯片产业的后来者。

sentences.english: Dr. Vivienne Luk, Director of Institute for Enterprise Development, Hong Kong Baptist University.
sentences.chinese: 香港浸会大学企业发展研究所所长陆何慧薇博士。

sentences.english: In the new work environment. You can show your strengths, to obtain satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 在新的工作环境中，你可以发挥所长，获得满足感。

sentences.english: In a way the best of both worlds.
Similarly, lawyers parcel out work based on who does that best.
sentences.chinese: 同样，律师按各人所长分派工作。

sentences.english: Mr Lynd, I want you to meet Mr Naomi Service, director of Cambex Research Institute.
sentences.chinese: 林德先生，我希望你见见坎培克斯研究所所长，内奥。

definition: the head of an institution whose name ends in 院[yuan4]/chair of a board/president of a university/department head/dean/premier of the Republic of China/CL:個|个[ge4]
deputy chair of board/vice-president (of a university etc)
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
